name: Five Nights With Piglet's 2 Rebooted
description:
2 Years Later, Piglet's Factory Employees Found A Mysterious Animatronic In The Safe-room That Was Left-Over, And So 10 Years Later, A Local Horror Attraction Has Been Build With This, And So The Security Guard, Has Started His Night-Shift... Finding out that there's still haunted souls of characters from the old Factory.

Requirments:

Os: Windows 7/8.1/10

Storage: 90 MB
